name: Solar Radio
description:
Solar Radio

A music puzzle game in space. 
Follow the radio.

Art inspired by Sokpop's helionaut

Controls

WASD and Mouse
R - Restart

Made in a week for Prototype Studio course at the NYU Game Center.
Prompt: Your Song (Make a game for a randomly assigned song)
Music: Solar Power by Ashley Shadow

Instructor: Bennett Foddy
